title: Date Bubble Watch
description: Date Bubble Watch for smartwatch:- live magnifying b u B B l e- auto chin adjustment on motorola 360- versatile: install your own face and hands!!What it does:Motorola 360 chin compensation pushes chin area upwards so that the whole face is visible (see screenshot).Carefully optimized for battery efficiency.Highly versatile: User Customized background image (watch face is customizable!!) install your own image to use as the watch face !User Customized watch hands: install your own image to use as watch hands too !And yes, that bubble is indeed live just like the magnifying bubble on a real watch !
descriptionHTML:
Date Bubble Watch for smartwatch:

- live magnifying b u B B l e
- auto chin adjustment on motorola 360
- versatile: install your own face and hands!!

What it does:
Motorola 360 chin compensation pushes chin area upwards so that the whole face is visible (see screenshot).

Carefully optimized for battery efficiency.

Highly versatile: User Customized background image (watch face is customizable!!) install your own image to use as the watch face !
User Customized watch hands: install your own image to use as watch hands too !

And yes, that bubble is indeed live just like the magnifying bubble on a real watch !
